ProductTrans.Description: Reinflate your burst tires after running over a spike strip.
ProductTrans.LongDescription: Instantly reinflate your burst tires after running over a spike strip during a Pursuit.

ProductTrans.Description: Using this during a Race sends traffic cars into the leader.
ProductTrans.LongDescription: Using this during a Race redirects traffic cars into the race leader's path.

ProductTrans.Description: Instantly end a Pursuit when you are in Cooldown.
ProductTrans.LongDescription: Instantly end a Pursuit by playing this Powerup when you are in Cooldown mode.
Use the Shield to protect yourself against the Traffic Magnet Powerup.

ProductTrans.Description: Catch the leaders with a burst of speed.
ProductTrans.LongDescription: Boosts your car's performance when you are in 2nd place or lower.

ProductTrans.Description: Ready all Powerups for immediate use.
ProductTrans.LongDescription: Resets the timer on all Powerups so you can use them again instantly.

ProductTrans.Description: Knock cars out of the way with ramming speed.
ProductTrans.LongDescription: Choose Juggernaut when you want to drive through traffic; not round it.

ProductTrans.Description: Push Cops away from you to get a better chance to escape.
ProductTrans.LongDescription: Use this Powerup to push Cops away from you and give you a better chance to escape.

ProductTrans.Description: Triggers an Emergency Evade for your entire team
ProductTrans.LongDescription: Triggers an Emergency Evade for your entire team

ProductTrans.Description: Increase your speed to catch up to the leader or escape the cops.
ProductTrans.LongDescription: Increases your speed briefly to help catch up to the leader or escape the Cops

ProductTrans.Description: Adds another lap to a multiple-lap Race. Usable only once per Race.
ProductTrans.LongDescription: Adds another lap to a multiple-lap Race (like Circuit) but it can only be used once per Race.

ProductTrans.Description: Gives your team a short boost in speed.
ProductTrans.LongDescription: Gives your team a short boost in speed.
